abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Khalid M. Al-Saad
            at the Board meeting of June 3, 1997 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy, Agriculture Sector Adjustment Loan and
            the Social Protection Adjustment Loan for Romania.
